Philippine: The heroism of 12-year-old schoolgirl Janela Lelis.
Atty. Koko Pimentel proclaimed as Senator of the Republic of the Philippines.
Former President Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo was arrested.
One hundred eighty-eight members of the House of Representatives sign Articles of Impeachment against Chief Justice Renato Corona, later to be sent to the Senate.
Tropical Storm Washi (Sendong) causes flash floods, leaving 1,080 people dead and affecting Cagayan de Oro and Iligan cities.
